bibl.title: ""The Mysterious Squares"" O. Lips. ÄMUL dem. Inv. 1270 Reconsidered.
bibl.note: O. Lips. dem. Inv. 1270 [ed.: Wilhelm Spiegelberg, P. Eleph. dem. I, pp. 12-13]. - List of ten men who were unable to pay back their debts when they were due; next to the list there are some squares that could be a very schematic drawing of the fields related to the debts. Theban region, 2nd / 1st century B.C. - Pp. 316- 319: Excursus on debts in light of documentary texts from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Franziska Naether, ""The Mysterious Squares"" O. Lips. ÄMUL dem. Inv. 1270 Reconsidered.
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 311-324, 1 pl. coul.

O. Lips. dem. Inv. 1270 [ed.: Wilhelm Spiegelberg, P. Eleph. dem. I, pp. 12-13]. - List of ten men who were unable to pay back their debts when they were due; next to the list there are some squares that could be a very schematic drawing of the fields related to the debts. Theban region, 2nd / 1st century B.C. - Pp. 316- 319: Excursus on debts in light of documentary texts from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
